notFoundDesc: The page you're looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.
notFoundFooter: Check the URL or navigate back to safety.
forbiddenDesc: You do not have permission to access this resource.
forbiddenFooter: If you believe this is an error, contact your administrator.
serverErrorDesc: Something went wrong on our end. We're working on it.
serverErrorFooter: Please try again later or contact support.
serviceUnavailableDesc: The service is temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.
unauthorizedDesc: You must be logged in to access this page.
